reviews.review: Great game to have i highly reccomend it
The best zombie game ;P
If you like the idea of arena co-op survival against waves of zombies, spider-monsters, and giant angry monsters with bloody drills for hands, then you might want to give this a shot

...Buy it ;-)
......It is currently with a Christmas Special.

Killing Floor is brilliant.
why is that? Because there is alot bang for your buck in this game. 
It is focused on multiplayer and especially in the co-op genre. Is there anything better than killing a bunch of mutate and enhanced zombie-like mongrels with your best friends? not that i know. 
Not to forget are the huge free Content upgrades from Tripwire. New Class (Demolition), a big bunch of new weapons, new Maps and alot of new achivements.

In short, this game is awesome if you like killing things from the first person view with your friends.

I love it and i recommend it to everyone :)

Killing floor lacks in graphics and story, but makes up in lots of guns, need for skillful use of weapons, and zombies with fleshgrinders for hands! It's fun, great with friends, and is really a lot of action. Some may compared it to L4D, but the two do not really compare due to the differences in enemies and weapons. Also, no Crosshairs+Ironsights makes the need to aim all too present in Killing Floor. So Lads, gear up, aim for the head, and lets go kill some of these tossers!
This was super fun back when it was a free mod for UT2k4. It's still super fun now and totally worth whatever price it is.

No exits, no magic closets, and more zombies that can kill you faster than you can say "Holy crap!".  Teamwork is key to surviving this hell on earth.  7 different perks (classes) with their own bonuses, tons of different weapons. Awesome game.  Worth buying, even moreso if you can catch it on sale!

If you like horror survival, then this game is for you.  The game has great atmorphere, and a large variety of horrific creatures for you to kill.  The gameplay is challenging and gives you a great sense of accomplishment with class levels and a large variety of acheivments.  Ontop of this, the game developers have shown real interest in the games community by listening to criticisms and taking them in stride by attempting to imporve the game through multiple updates.  This game is a great bang for your buck, and I promise you will get more enjoyment from playing this game than you do for most games you spend twice as much for.

This is a great game coming from a developer that puts customers first. If you're into games that require good teamwork and effort, then this is a game you should be playing. 7 different "classes" known as perks, many stock and custom maps, over 7 different types of zeds to fight wave after wave, and enough weapons to do it. Tripwire even recently just released a Holiday update which added 30 new achivements and a new map FREE if you need proof of their suport. Buy it and you won't be dissapointed.
wow, un tripudio di suoni colori e massacro gratuito di povere vittime di un esperimento fallito, uno dei giochi piu divertenti degli ultimi 10 anni :D altro che l4d !
BUY THE GAME YALL ITS AWESOME
Wave after wave of zombies, you cant get any better than that

It's a really fun game.

You fight off 10 waves of zombies, or "specimens", and then you fight the Patriarch who is fucking tough as nails!

To help you out, you can have a squad of up to 5 other players with you. There are servers that let you have bigger squads, but you can't build up your perks on them. :(
The more people are in the squad, the larger the waves get.

Did I mention the perks system?
You have a variety of perks (Medic, Sharpshooter, Commando, Demolitions, Firebug, Support Specialist, Berserker) to choose from, they all start at level 0 but you can level up any of them at any time.
You'll probably level up Sharpshooter first since its requirements are the easiest.

Also, this is probably just me but, the Christmas versions of the monsters look much better than their regular versions. I'm gonna be kind of sad when the event ends.

What's that? You want a game where there are zombies and akiller last boss, pure survival until the last wave is the only objective, guns that make the killing satisfying?
Boy, have I got a game for you...
This game is a ton of bloody, gory fun.

I stand by my original review long ago.  Killing Floor is a great game if you're looking to survive against a deadly enemy with your buddies.   

With new mods and a community still kicking, this is worth the price.
Don't judge this game by its single player experience alone - as it is lacking. But co-op is where this game shines, even moreso with friends.

kedvenc

I will start off by saying that you will either play this game for hundreds of hours, or not at all.  People who fall in between are the minority.

Ever play the Nazi Zombie minigame in Call of Duty: World at War or Black Ops?  Now imagine a full sized version of that with a huge selection of official maps on top of the many more user created maps on top of that complete with classes, a shop to purchase weapons between rounds, boss fights, multiple types of enemies and more!

Recently updated yet again over a year and a half after release, this game is second only to TF2 in terms of official updates.  With 132 achievements and perks that take awhile to level up, there's always plenty to do here.  And people actually co-operate when you play on the harder difficulties (usually)!

Long story short, if you enjoyed Nazi Zombies this will suck away so much of your time.  Totally worth the price of admission.
recomended if you like working with others.

A great game for enthusiasts of welding doors.

Though it may not have the most up to date graphics and finding a server might take longer than one would like once you actually get into the game especially with a friend or five the six player co-op is amazingly entertaining. On the lower difficulties it's a blazing fast free for all but hell on earth is literally that, work together or you will die alone and watch as mutants eat your bones.

A great alternative to L4D. If you can get it on the cheap :)

monsters, monsters and much more dead monsters!

I have it since the release and all I can say is that it's a good horror survival. There are waves of monsters (not zombies, monsters) approaching and you just start off with a knife and a pistol. If you're lucky you find a better weapon but if not you need to think of a plan on how to kill all those basterds (damn you, censorship). After every round you can switch your class and buy weapons and then everything goes on, where every wave more monsters and/or stronger ones come.
But don't focus on singleplayer. Killing Floor is meant to be played with your friends or even some strangers. More players = more ZEDs (the monsters in the game) = more fun!

The graphics are good, the controls are easy to learn and I am sure everybody is able to hit a fat monster with a pistol. Or shotgun... or chainsaw. There is a weapon for every kind of player out there!
If you're looking for a British version of L4D, a bit of a laugh, and some more zombie killing, this is for you.
Geiler brutaler Scheiß aber bitte aus UK beziehen!

this game is really fun to play with friends and still awesome online with people you dont know. there are 7 classes that you can level up, which grants you better abilities for that class. there is a good variety of enemies and a boss enemy called the patriarch (a tall zombie with a chaingun arm and rockets that can take 70 of your 100 health away so be prepared). there are many guns for each specific class that you can buy at the trader, (a shop that opens up after you survive through a wave of enemies).overall this game is great, and it updates frequently.

Hier gibts es nichts zu meckern.
Einfach nur klasse, geile Waffen geil gemacht, geile Charaktere und Maps und vor allem unzensiert ^^

Am meisten macht es Spaß, wenn man das Spiel mit genug Kollegen zockt und die Anzahl der Gegner pro Welle variiert je nach Anzahl der Leute auf dem Server.
Was ich auch einfach super finde ist, dass man mit den Perks (Klassen), z.B. Scharfschütze, Kommander, Ingeneur etc. Level steigen kann und somit verschiedene Eigenschaften besitzt, was auch gut ist, dass jede Klasse ihre eigene Waffenart besitzt ^^
Von mir 10/10 Punkte ^^
